name: Reliquias Del Pasado - Student Proyect
description:
This is our student proyect for our 4th semester (second year) at Da Vinci Multimedia School, developed by Santiago R. D'Angelo and Alejandro Caffarena. This semester our assignment was to develop a game for Mobile Phones. The game is available for both PC and Mobile, however due to the holidays the PC version is extremly derivative of the mobile one and doesn't have keyboard controls fully implemented as of yet.

The game is also in spanish and has not been translated.

The game will be updated soon, but we are uploading it as-is to provide a showcase of our current unity experience.

PC CONTROLS

  • Movement - Screen Joystick, drag with mouse
  • Shield - Shield Button or the Q key.
  • Attack - Attack Button or the A key.
  • Shoot - Bow Button or the R key.
